name: UE4 Pacman Style Template
description:
Have you ever wanted to create something like Pacman in Unreal Engine?

This is your chance to get a full project with a working Pacman style game.

Pacman needs to collect all dots from the level, phantoms will chase him but he can collect also red dots that will make phantoms seem a delicious meal.

Phantoms return to the initial cell once they are eaten and continue chasing our hero until all dots are collected.
